title: The Specter Bridegroom - portrayal of the family

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Irving uses literary elements and techniques to develop a complex portrayal of the family.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Irving uses literary elements and techniques to develop a complex portrayal of the family.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
